title: GET_LANDING_GEAR_STATE
content:
0x9B0F3DCA3DB0F4CD0xA6F02670// GetLandingGearState
int GET_LANDING_GEAR_STATE(Vehicle vehicle);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to check.Returns: The current state of the vehicles landing gear.Landing gear states:  
0: Deployed  
1: Closing (Retracting)
3: Opening (Deploying)
4: Retracted  
5: Broken
Landing gear state 2 is never used.Old name:  _GET_VEHICLE_LANDING_GEAR
codeBlocks:
Landing gear states:  
0: Deployed  
1: Closing (Retracting)
3: Opening (Deploying)
4: Retracted  
5: Broken
